title: Speed of the new clientâ€¦.
body:
About this new client.
All the graphics improvements are pretty but..

Sorry to say that so far this new client has ZERO benefits and only downsides to me.

Improving a few graphics etc CANNOT be at the expense of performance.


I'm on a Mac book air, 1.3 GHz intel core i5, 4GB 1600MHz DDR3.

The game runs PERFECTLY FINE.
The old clients runs PERFECTLY FINE.
The new client is close to unusable... even just changing page takes forever...
Its illogical for the client to be more demanding than playing the game...

Even in low spec mode this new client is a disaster on speed.... just makes me want to stop using the game.

There is no way I can play normal games, ill not only be last to pick, i'll be even a bit short on time to select a champ! Sorry to add to all the other comments of the like but its the reality:  this new client is an horror on performance!

We live in an age of high speed performance for website loading time in less than 2 seconds, and special optimization for ultra fast loading experiences on mobile with Google AMP and so on. 

There is no doubt that a lot of hard work went into building this new client but as long as the speed is not fixed this is a failure.
There is no valid reason for this client to be so slow, sorry to say this is sad and simply unacceptable...

replies.body: I'm having the same issues, with the new client running so much slower than the old one

As with all Beta software, there are bound to be quirks or issues along the way. Performance and optimization are certainly big goals for the Client update team as they continue to migrate features into the beta client. Since I don't work on that team, I recommend leaving your feedback on our [**Client Discussion Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion), since this feedback could potentially help that team out a lot.

For now, I recommend using the Legacy Client until some more improvements have been made to the Legacy Client that will improve the experience for you.
